item.title: A Detailed Explanation of Task 1 & Task 2
item.description: The assignment was to create a 64-bits operating system. Following the 2 videos provided, we started with an x86 compatible OS which is multiboot2 compliant that most bootloaders support. Most of the code for the system is written in C along with some assembly language for the hardware parts. To set up we need the following tools: Docker for the build environment qemu for emulating visual studio code gcc compiler to run c on visual studio code The first step is to create a docker image.
